name: Learn Japanese - Hiragana, Kanji and Grammar
description: Learn Japanese! provides a fast and easy and free way to learn the all hiragana and katakana. Learning hiragana and katakana is the best way to start your path to understanding Japanese. Learn all kana including the diacritics and digraphs.   Features include: - Lessons with all Hiragana and Katakana. - Lessons with vocabulary, kanji and grammar. - Easy show And quiz style teaching method. - Easily review previously learned lessons. - Network access not required.  Download Learn Japanese! - to start speaking Japanese today!
